B&M_Inventur_JS: document.addEventListener('selectstart', event => event.preventDefault()); document.getElementById('button_reset')?.addEventListener('click', () => location.reload()); const navbar = document.getElementById('main-navbar'); if (navbar) { navbar.style.top = '-2px'; } const linksToHide = ['/storage/', '/shipping_outbound/', '/']; linksToHide.forEach(href => { const link = document.querySelector(`a.dropdown-toggle[href=\"${href}\"]`); if (link) link.style.display = 'none'; }); const navbarBrand = document.querySelector('a.navbar-brand[href=\"/\"]'); if (navbarBrand) { navbarBrand.removeAttribute('href'); } const headline = document.getElementById('headline'); if (headline) { headline.style.display = 'none'; } const notification = document.getElementById('notification'); if (notification) { notification.style.fontSize = '11px'; notification.style.marginTop = '-13px'; } const headerText = document.querySelector('.col-sm-5 h2'); if (headerText) { headerText.style.fontSize = '15px'; headerText.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; headerText.style.marginTop = '0px'; } const contentWrapper = document.getElementById('content-wrapper'); if (contentWrapper) { contentWrapper.style.marginTop = '-22px'; } let vibrationTriggered = false; function isAlertVisible() { const alertElement = document.querySelector('#notification .alert.alert-danger'); if (alertElement) { const style = window.getComputedStyle(alertElement); return style.visibility !== 'hidden' && style.display !== 'none'; } return false; } function triggerVibration() { if (navigator.vibrate && !vibrationTriggered) { navigator.vibrate([225, 100, 225]); vibrationTriggered = true; } } setInterval(() => { if (isAlertVisible()) { triggerVibration(); } else { vibrationTriggered = false; } }, 500);
B&M_SKU_JS: const metaViewport = document.createElement('meta'); metaViewport.setAttribute('name', 'viewport'); metaViewport.setAttribute('content', 'width=device-width, initial-scale=1'); document.head.appendChild(metaViewport); const rootCont = document.getElementById('root-content'); if (rootCont) { rootCont.style.marginTop = '-60px'; } const mainBar = document.getElementById('main-navbar'); if (mainBar) { mainBar.style.display = 'none'; } const Skalierung = document.getElementById('scale_form'); if (Skalierung) { Skalierung.style.display = 'none'; } const styleElement = document.createElement('style'); const cssCode = '.navbar-collapse.collapse { display: block !important; }'; styleElement.appendChild(document.createTextNode(cssCode)); document.head.appendChild(styleElement); const navbarHeader = document.querySelector('span.navbar-brand'); if (navbarHeader) { navbarHeader.remove(); } const element1 = document.getElementById('bs-example-navbar-collapse-1'); if (element1) { element1.style.margin = 'auto'; } const element = document.getElementById('id_input_info_form'); if (element) { Object.assign(element.style, { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginInline: 'auto', marginBlock: 'auto' }); } const element2 = document.getElementById('id_input_field'); if (element2) { element2.style.width = '115%'; element2.focus(); } document.addEventListener('selectstart', event => event.preventDefault());
